description: Try our easy to follow Summer Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rolls,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tofu,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Summer Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cover noodles with boiling water in a bowl. Stand for 5 minutes or until soft. Drain. Roughly cut with scissors.
Place cabbage and lime juice in a separate bowl.

To make the dipping sauce, whisk 1/2 cup hoisin sauce, 1/4 cup vegan mayonnaise and the juice of 1 large lime in a bowl to combine. Add a little boiling water, a spoon at a time, until the consistency of cream.

Submerge 1 rice paper wrapper in a bowl of lukewarm water until soft. Lay on a clean tea towel. Place some noodles, vegetables, tofu and 1 mint leaf across wrapper close to you. Fold bottom up over filling and fold both sides in. Roll once, then place another mint leaf on the roll and finish rolling. Place on a tray lined with plastic wrap. Repeat with remaining wrappers and filling. Serve with dipping sauce.
